Calculate Statistical Measures for Bar Plots

Source: R/wp_plot_bar.r
in_calculate_bar_statistics.Rd

Internal function that computes statistical measures for each country/variable combination. Handles both mean and latest value calculations along with supporting statistics like median, min, and max.

Used by: in_process_bar_data, in_process_multi_bar_data Uses: No direct function calls

Calculates for each group:

  • Mean value

  • Median value

  • Latest value

  • Min/Max values

  • Number of data points

  • Date information for latest values

Usage

in_calculate_bar_statistics(data, type = "Mean")

Developed by Benjamin Peeters.
